full_threads.body:
Hi Michelle, 

Ok sure, we have adjusted the buttons now for smaller screen sizes.

Thanks so much Heath; could you please just fix up the alignment of the buttons in the first and third rows?

Cheers
Michelle

Hi Michelle, 

Confirming the below links have now been updated.
Added phonaklaunch.com.au to Harvest and logged 35 mins.
@heath  phonaklaunch.com.au is not yet added to Harvest, Will I add it? If yes, what is their plan?

hi @heath im done updating the links, thanks
madam @rica 35minutes

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
@glen can you please update these links also on Phonak site? Let me know if you need some starting points?

Thanks.

Subject: Re: Launch site - Sky M

Sure, confirming we have updated the below links. It’s best if the files sit in ShowPro. We’ll be happy to update them once they are ready.

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

On 22 Sep 2020, at 3:55 pm, Mowbray, Michelle <Michelle.Mowbray@phonak.com <mailto:Michelle.Mowbray@phonak.com>> wrote:

Hi Heath
I hope your week is going well?
The Hearing Australia physicians using the Sky M launch page (https://phonaklaunch.com.au/hearingaustralia/ <https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fphonaklaunch.com.au%2Fhearingaustralia%2F&data=02%7C01%7CMichelle.Mowbray%40phonak.com%7C4da143f39b2b4c23865e08d85ec88ba3%7Cf1ed0701294e404ca13bf81f707f845b%7C0%7C0%7C637363562725052452&sdata=QQYYoc11g6yZT8nXkRfWJnd2EU3uylgHnVDlgrDg1B8%3D&reserved=0>) are having trouble accessing the files because they’re on Dropbox.
I’ve included new links below for the most popular professional brochures; for the rest is it possible to store them on the site instead of Dropbox; or is the best solution to save them all on Showpad (where the below are now saved)? The consumer brochure will only need the online viewing version rather than the print-ready version (they can order printed copied from us).
